content: mirkwood by rebecca wilder a sock to commemorate the last of the j r tolkien movies for not all who wander are lost ………… ………… the dwarves and bilbo wandered through the erie forest of mirkwood finished foot circumferences small 7-1/2-8 medium 8-1/2-9 and large 9-1/2-10 yarn fingering weight super fine #1 400 yds needles u s size 1 2 25mm circular cir or double point needles or adjust needle size to obtain correct gauge notions cable needles cn markers m tapestry needle gauge 28 sts = 4 10cm in stockinette stitch in the round directions for the right sock right sock stitch guide c6f slip 3 sts to cable needle hold in front knit next 3 sts then knit 3 sts from cable needle cuff ribbing co 56 64 72 sts being careful not to twist sts join for working in the round and place marker pm for beginning of round work rnds 1-18 of ribbing pattern as follows round 1 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 2 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 3 k2 p2 c6f *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 4 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 5 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 6 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 7 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 8 k2 p2 c6f *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 9 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 10 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 11 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 12 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to *last two sts end p2 round 13 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 14 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 15 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 16 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 17 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 round 18 k2 p2 k6 *p2 k2* repeat from * to * last two sts end p2 leg the ribbing will now change to a stockinette stitch the cable will continue down the front of the sock but the back will be knit in stockinette stitch work rnds 1-18 of leg pattern
